name: extinction-neanderthals
description: Neanderthals disappeared from Europe after coexisting with modern humans for thousands of years, likely due to competition and climate change.

name: younger-dryas-climate-event
description: A sudden return to glacial conditions lasting over 1,000 years disrupted early human societies and may have triggered agricultural development.

name: white-ship-sinks
description: The sinking of the White Ship off Normandy killed the heir to the English throne, triggering a succession crisis known as The Anarchy.

name: tulip-mania-crashes
description: The Dutch tulip market collapsed after speculation drove bulb prices to extraordinary highs, becoming history's first recorded economic bubble.

name: kobe-earthquake
description: A 6.9 magnitude earthquake struck Kobe, Japan, killing over 6,400 people and causing widespread destruction to the port city.

name: space-shuttle-columbia-disaster
description: Space Shuttle Columbia disintegrated during re-entry over Texas, killing all seven crew members due to heat shield damage from launch debris.

name: lehman-brothers-collapse
description: The bankruptcy of Lehman Brothers became the largest in U.S. history, triggering the global financial crisis and worldwide recession.

name: copenhagen-climate-summit
description: The UN climate conference ended without a binding agreement, widely seen as a diplomatic failure in addressing global warming.

name: iceland-eyjafjallajokull-eruption
description: The eruption of Eyjafjallajokull created an ash cloud that halted European air travel for weeks, stranding millions of passengers.

name: hurricane-sandy
description: Hurricane Sandy devastated the northeastern U.S. coast, causing over $70 billion in damage and killing more than 230 people.

name: notre-dame-fire
description: A fire engulfed Notre-Dame Cathedral in Paris, destroying its iconic spire and much of the roof of the 850-year-old landmark.

name: extinction-rebellion-protests
description: Climate activists staged major civil disobedience protests across world capitals, blocking streets to demand action on climate change.

name: svb-collapse
description: Silicon Valley Bank failed in the second-largest bank collapse in U.S. history, triggering fears of a broader banking crisis.
